channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- visionOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- visionOS

item.title: CVE-2024-23262|2024-08-05T20:01:16.156Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: This issue was addressed with additional entitlement checks. This issue is fixed in visionOS 1.1, iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4, iOS 16.7.6 and iPadOS 16.7.6. An app may be able to spoof system notifications and UI.

item.title: CVE-2024-23295|2024-08-01T22:59:32.151Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: A permissions issue was addressed to help ensure Personas are always protected This issue is fixed in visionOS 1.1. An unauthenticated user may be able to use an unprotected Persona.

item.title: CVE-2024-23265|2024-08-01T22:59:32.131Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability was addressed with improved locking. This issue is fixed in macOS Monterey 12.7.4, macOS Ventura 13.6.5, macOS Sonoma 14.4, visionOS 1.1, iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4, watchOS 10.4, iOS 16.7.6 and iPadOS 16.7.6, tvOS 17.4. An app may be able to cause unexpected system termination or write kernel memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-23262|2024-08-01T22:59:32.059Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: This issue was addressed with additional entitlement checks. This issue is fixed in visionOS 1.1, iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4, iOS 16.7.6 and iPadOS 16.7.6. An app may be able to spoof system notifications and UI.

item.title: CVE-2024-23263|2024-08-01T22:59:32.071Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved validation. This issue is fixed in tvOS 17.4, macOS Sonoma 14.4, visionOS 1.1, iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4, watchOS 10.4, iOS 16.7.6 and iPadOS 16.7.6, Safari 17.4. Processing maliciously crafted web content may prevent Content Security Policy from being enforced.

item.title: CVE-2024-23246|2024-08-01T22:59:32.063Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: This issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.4, visionOS 1.1, iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4, watchOS 10.4, iOS 16.7.6 and iPadOS 16.7.6, tvOS 17.4. An app may be able to break out of its sandbox.

item.title: CVE-2024-23257|2024-08-01T22:59:32.110Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixed in macOS Monterey 12.7.4, macOS Ventura 13.6.5, macOS Sonoma 14.4, visionOS 1.1, iOS 16.7.6 and iPadOS 16.7.6. Processing an image may result in disclosure of process memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-23235|2024-08-01T22:59:31.970Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: A race condition was addressed with additional validation. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.4, visionOS 1.1, iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4, watchOS 10.4, iOS 16.7.6 and iPadOS 16.7.6, tvOS 17.4. An app may be able to access user-sensitive data.

item.title: CVE-2024-23284|2024-08-01T22:59:32.132Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue is fixed in tvOS 17.4, macOS Sonoma 14.4, visionOS 1.1, iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4, watchOS 10.4, iOS 16.7.6 and iPadOS 16.7.6, Safari 17.4. Processing maliciously crafted web content may prevent Content Security Policy from being enforced.

item.title: CVE-2024-23264|2024-08-01T22:59:32.171Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: A validation issue was addressed with improved input sanitization. This issue is fixed in macOS Monterey 12.7.4, macOS Ventura 13.6.5, macOS Sonoma 14.4, visionOS 1.1, iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4, iOS 16.7.6 and iPadOS 16.7.6, tvOS 17.4. An application may be able to read restricted memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-23226|2024-08-01T22:59:32.102Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixed in macOS Sonoma 14.4, visionOS 1.1, iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4, watchOS 10.4, tvOS 17.4. Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23254|2024-08-01T22:59:32.080Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: The issue was addressed with improved UI handling. This issue is fixed in tvOS 17.4, macOS Sonoma 14.4, visionOS 1.1, iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4, watchOS 10.4, Safari 17.4. A malicious website may exfiltrate audio data cross-origin.

item.title: CVE-2024-23220|2024-08-01T22:59:32.018Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of caches. This issue is fixed in visionOS 1.1, iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4. An app may be able to fingerprint the user.

item.title: CVE-2024-23258|2024-08-01T22:59:32.080Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation. This issue is fixed in visionOS 1.1, macOS Sonoma 14.4. Processing an image may lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23286|2024-08-01T22:59:32.209Z -- apple -- visionos
item.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling. item.description: The issue was addressed with improvements to the file handling protocol. This issue is fixed in visionOS 1.2. Processing web content may lead to a denial-of-service.
